title: RIP Ahri
body:
Delete DFG (obviously a very popular item on Ahri) and to compensate, they nerf ahri to the floor? 

RIP Ahri. The speed boost on q + small scalings on w + e are in no way, shape or form equivalent to the 20% bonus dmg on her old e. 

So dumb.

replies.body: she was originally supposed to be a kiting mage

but they nerfed that then made her an assassin then nerfed her again too become something less powerful then when she was originally released AND when she was an assassin. gg rito, way to %%%% with all ahri mains

> [{quoted}](name=Vexus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=GU7rLrad,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-29T16:17:42.756+0000)
>
> but they nerfed that then made her an assassin then nerfed her again too become something less powerful then when she was originally released AND when she was an assassin. gg rito, way to %%%% with all ahri mains

yeah and just got the skin she deals around the same damage if you don't use dfg but yeah it was hard taking away the 20% increase
She still has her true damage stop complaining

I never built DFG on Ahri. Seemed stupid.

Now, Rod of Ages, THAT'S an item!

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=GU7rLrad,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-01-29T23:28:44.279+0000)
>
> I never built DFG on Ahri. Seemed stupid.
> 
> Now, Rod of Ages, THAT'S an item!

God damn your confusingly functional builds.
I never understand them, yet they work.

And this is coming from attack speed Karma jungle and AD Support Lulu.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=GU7rLrad,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2015-01-31T01:55:37.864+0000)
>
> Lulu needs mob boots.

No she doesn't. She needs CDR and Beserker's Greaves.

Only her Q stops her from moving fast.

GOTTAGOFAST

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=GU7rLrad,comment-id=00050000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-31T07:16:51.791+0000)
>
> Only her Q stops her from moving fast.
> 
> GOTTAGOFAST

No need for mob boots m8. Just use the Sanic edition of Whimsey to get places.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=GU7rLrad,comment-id=0005000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-01T00:03:10.532+0000)
>
> BUTYOUALWAYSGOTTAGOFAST

Then why get Mobi boots? They aren't perma fast m8888. Swifties with Alacrity plus Zephyr though and three dragons...
As an Ahri you don't have to rely on DFG. I can play her without a dfg and still end laning phase successfully and with some kills. All it takes is skill

think of it like this:
Now, when you do well with Ahri you can feel skilled, instead of feeling like you just cheated the other team.
its actually a good thing

Oh no, now Ahri players have to press more than DFG+one charge of ult+Q+foxfire to instakill any mid (under their own tower) and still have tools to escape? Now if only they'd nerf Zed a little more...
